channel.title: Ham Radio on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Ham Radio on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Ann Arbor Field Day 2014
item.description:
Thanks to Dan KB6NU for these details of Field Day in Ann Arbor June 27-29 2014.

As for Field Day, It will be at the Ann Arbor Airport, near the soccer fields. We'll be setting up antennas on Friday night, breakfast is at Mark's Midtown Coney Island down on State at 8 am Saturday, more setup will commence after breakfast, operating will start at 2pm Saturday and run through 2pm Sunday.

I'll fill in with more details when I have them; I hope to get involved in the fun.

item.title: kilo delta 8 oscar quebec golf
item.description:
Aka KD8OQG, my ham radio call sign.

I use it most frequently on Sunday nights, for the W8UM net (145.230 MHz, -600 kHz shift, 100 Hz PL) every Sunday at 8 PM Eastern run by the University of Michigan Amateur Radio Club.
